sentences.en: ‘Exercise’ is a word which covers a vast range of activities.
sentences.cn: “锻炼”一词包含非常广泛的活动。

sentences.en: a blue duvet cover
sentences.cn: 蓝色的羽绒被套

sentences.en: A cheap table can be transformed by an interesting cover.
sentences.cn: 一块趣味盎然的桌布就能使一张廉价桌子面目一新。

sentences.en: a course covering business law
sentences.cn: 一门包括商业法的课程

sentences.en: a plastic waterproof cover for the stroller
sentences.cn: 手推童车的塑料防水篷

sentences.en: Are there any areas you feel are not covered adequately in the book?
sentences.cn: 书中是否有哪些方面你觉得论述得还不够详细？

sentences.en: Charles lit the fuses and they ran for cover.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯点燃了导火索，他们便赶紧四处躲避。

sentences.en: Cover the pot and bake for an hour.
sentences.cn: 把锅盖上，烘烤一小时。

sentences.en: Cover with plastic film and refrigerate for 24 hours.
sentences.cn: 覆上保鲜膜，冷藏24小时。

sentences.en: Grey mould covered the walls.
sentences.cn: 灰色的霉菌布满了墙面。

sentences.en: He wears a cap to cover a spot of baldness.
sentences.cn: 他戴帽以遮斑秃。

sentences.en: His photo’s on the cover of ‘Newsweek’ again.
sentences.cn: 他的照片又登上《新闻周刊》的封面了。

sentences.en: I read the magazine from cover to cover (= all of it ) .
sentences.cn: 我把这本杂志从头到尾看了一遍。

sentences.en: I should point out that these estimates cover just the hospital expenditures.
sentences.cn: 我应该指出，这些估算仅包括医院的费用。

sentences.en: I’d just returned from covering the Cambodian war.
sentences.cn: 我刚报道完柬埔寨战争回来。

sentences.en: Just play it safe, cover your ass, keep your head down.
sentences.cn: 要谨慎行事，保护好自己并保持低调。

sentences.en: Lean the plants against a wall and cover the roots with peat.
sentences.cn: 把植物靠墙摆放，用泥煤盖住根部。

sentences.en: Motorways actually cover less than 0.1 percent of the countryside.
sentences.cn: 高速公路的实际覆盖面积还不到农村地区的0.1%。

sentences.en: Much of the country is covered by snow.
sentences.cn: 这个国家的大部分地区都被白雪覆盖。

sentences.en: Pack the fruits and nuts into the jars and cover with brandy.
sentences.cn: 把水果和坚果放进罐子里，用白兰地酒浸泡。

sentences.en: pollutants that are not covered by the Kyoto agreement
sentences.cn: 《京都议定书》里没有包括的污染物

sentences.en: Robinson was sent to Italy to cover the 1990 World Cup.
sentences.cn: 鲁宾逊被派到意大利报道1990年的世界杯比赛。

sentences.en: She wore a low-cut dress, partly covered by a thin shawl.
sentences.cn: 她穿了件低胸连衣裙，搭了一条薄薄的披肩。

sentences.en: Shoppers took cover behind cars as police marksmen returned fire.
sentences.cn: 警方的射击手开火回击时，购物者们躲在汽车后面。

sentences.en: stucco could cover a multitude of sins, including poor brickwork.
sentences.cn: 粉刷可以掩饰许多毛病，包括很差的砌砖工作。

sentences.en: The history course covered a lot of ground in six weeks.
sentences.cn: 历史课在六周内涉及很广

sentences.en: The Oxford Chemistry Primers aim to cover important topics in organic chemistry.
sentences.cn: 《牛津化学初级读本》丛书旨在论述有机化学中的重要问题。

sentences.en: the yacht made landfall under cover of darkness.
sentences.cn: 游艇在夜幕的掩护下靠岸了。

sentences.en: They were charged with failing to have professional indemnity cover.
sentences.cn: 他们被指控未能提供职业保险保障。

sentences.en: Those figures might not even cover the cost of breakages.
sentences.cn: 那笔钱甚至都不够赔偿破损费。

sentences.en: We need more time to cover so much ground (= include so many things ) .
sentences.cn: 我们需要更多时间来处理这么多事情。

sentences.en: while half the dishes are Italian, the kitchen covers the waterfront from Greece to Morocco.
sentences.cn: 尽管一半是意大利菜，炊事人员却来自五湖四海。

sentences.en: Why would she cover for someone who was trying to kill her?
sentences.cn: 她为什么要包庇想要杀她的人呢？

words.tran_cn: 保护；覆盖；掩护；有夫之妇的法律身分

phrases.tran_cn: （被追捕时）突然从藏身处（尤其是丛林中）出来
灭迹：掩盖痕迹以甩掉追踪者
处理，完成：以某种方式处理或完成某事
隐瞒（掩饰）许多问题（缺点）
(非正式)预见并避免受攻击（批评）
购买证券为了实现可以出售的承诺
电机活动盖板；荧光屏前面防护玻璃
(北美，非正式)涵盖很广；包括事物的各个方面
从（书或杂志的）第一页到最后一页，从头到尾
躲藏：为躲避敌人火力而寻求躲藏或保护
在未注明发送者的信封（包裹）内

trans.tran_cn: 掩护，保护，躲避处，避难所，保险，覆盖物，床罩，掩饰，自然植被，遮盖，替补，代劳
trans.tran_en: the outer front or back part of a magazine, book etc

trans.tran_cn: 遮盖，覆盖，撒上，包括，涉及，处理，行走，掩护，敷衍，给…保险，报道，足以支付，包庇，顶替，替补，采取预防行动，翻唱
trans.tran_en: to include or deal with a particular subject or group of things

trans.tran_cn: 盖，覆盖；范围为，占；行，走；包括，涉及，适用于；报道，采访；给…保险，使免受损失；掩护
trans.tran_en: to put something over or be over something in order to hide, close, or protect it
